eastern.translation[0].definitions[0].de: in or from the east of a country or area
eastern.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: the eastern shore of the island
eastern.translation[0].definitions[1].de: in or from the countries in Asia, especially China and Japan
eastern.translation[0].definitions[2].de: in or from the countries in the east part of Europe, especially the countries that used to have Communist governments
